== MacBook 2,1: Ubuntu-version-specific Wikis ==
<<BR>><<BR>>

This page links to wikis for the  '''2nd Generation Mac``Book''' (release date: late 2006, mid 2007 ).<<BR>>
<<BR>>
<<BR>>
The following wikis for the Mac``Book 2,1 are available:
* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook2-1/Hardy|Ubuntu 8.04/8.04.x LTS (Hardy Heron)]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook2-1/Intrepid|Ubuntu 8.10 (Intrepid Ibex)]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook2-1/Jaunty|Ubuntu 9.04 (Jaunty Jackalope)]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook2-1/Karmic|Ubuntu 9.10 (Karmic Koala)]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook2-1/Lucid|Ubuntu 10.04 (Lucid Lynx)]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook2-1/Maverick|Ubuntu 10.10 (Maverick Meerkat)]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook2-1/Wily|Ubuntu 15.10 (Wily Werewolf)]]</nowiki>
<<BR>>
<<BR>>
<<BR>>
* If you have a Mac``Book, but a hardware revision other then 2,1 (release date late 2006, mid 2007), go to the <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook|MacBook main page]]</nowiki>.
* If you have a different Intel CPU-based Macintosh hardware, please go to the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MactelSupportTeam/CommunityHelpPages|Mactel documentation start page]]</nowiki>.
<<BR>>
<<BR>>
If you haven't decided yet, what Ubuntu version to install, have a look at the <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MactelSupportTeam/AppleIntelInstallation?action=AttachFile&do=view&target=ubuntu-release-cycle.png| Ubuntu Distribution Release Cycle Overview.]]</nowiki>
